content:
Naadatthaal mrthare kabaril ninnetti puthran
Uththhaanatthil thejovasthram chaarttheedunnu.
Vaangippoyor thingippaarkkum paathaallatthil
Chennappollellaaperum thanne kai-kkondu.
Bahumaanaarththham kallaravaasikallaagatharaayi
Nyetti paathaalladvaaram than mumpil veenu.
Krooshaaroham moolam jeevan siddhichoraam
Vaangippoyor ninne sthothram cheytheedatte.
Aashvaasam ninnil kandoraam sarvvanmaarum
Angekkum thaathaathmaakkallkkum sthuthi paadatte.
Lokam vittorkkuththhaanatthil jeevan nalki
Thejovasthram chaartthunnonaam naathhaa! Sthothram.
